title: My Unintended
description: One bored housewife. One midlife crisis. One sexy rock god...On the surface, Tabitha appears to have it all. An adorable son, a successful husband, and a new life in the countryside. But all is not perfect.Then a chance encounter with her idol Matt turns her life upside down, with devastating consequences...Please note that this book is suitable for over 18s only. If you are easily offended by bad language/sexual content then please do not read. You have been warned...
author: Vicki Bowles
